name: Wrestling Mayhem Superstars
description:
Welcome to survival hell wrestling of wrestling games. Real Survival hell wrestling action starts when wrestling and boxing game combine in one action packed game like Monday night wrestling game. It is time to step in the tag wrestling arena fighting where world real wrestlers are waiting for a real wrestler to challenge them in crazy wrestling ring. Extreme fighting techniques introduced in this chair wrestling game to fight the revolution wrestler with full powers of taekwondo, karate, capoeira and martial arts in just one real fighting ring. Wrestlers challenged by wrestlers and real wrestlers always win in the real ring wrestling games.

Cell fighting wrestling games are always fun and joy for people due to brutal fighting against wrestlers of extreme arena fighting. Pick up your weapon of chair or table under the ring and throw it on the face of opponent in pro cell wrestling game. Today have no mercy like real boxing games and beat every tag team fighter in ring fighting games, chair and table. Dare to challenge the wrestlers around the world in this revolution of wrestling rumble and fight with them.
